channel.title: 2 Stat questions
channel.description:
Hi I have 2 questions about stats.
1.How can I recolor them? 2.How can i refresh the HP stat without the hpbar showing up above the players head and without a 0 hitdiff showing up on the player?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: 2 Stat questions
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“Odimaru, post:2, topic:73468”]There’s a TuT on your 1st question, the 2nd I’m not sure how to do. Search for ‘Changing Stat Colors’.[/quote]Yes, I’ve tried searching for that already. However, the topic has been deleted by mass delete. Because it says “this thread is eaither missing or off limits for you.”

Read full topic
